section.heading: Judicial review.
section.text: Any person aggrieved by an assessment of a deficiency in tax finally determined by the Mayor under the provisions of § 47-908 [repealed] may appeal to the Superior Court of the District of Columbia in the same manner and to the same extent as set forth in §§ 47-3303, 47-3304, 47-3306, 47-3307, and 47-3308.
